title: Simplify.for.Spotify.Rdio.iTunes.v3.0.MacOSX.Retail-CORE
description:
Simplify for Spotify, Rdio, iTunes v3.0 *RETAIL*              
                                                                               
                                                                             
        Cracked by....:  CORE              Release-Name..:  CR-N7905.ZIP      
        Supplied......:  CORE              Release-Date..:  2014/04/19        
        Packaged......:  Bergelmir         Release-Type..:  Music             
        Protection....:  DRM               OS............:  MacOSX            
        Crack/SN......:  None              Language......:  English           
        Rating........:  [You decide!]     Disks.........:  1                 
                                                                             
                                                                              
                              ..: DESCRiPTiON :..                             
                                                                              
                                                                              
      Simplify is the simplest way to control your music.                     
                                                                              
      Do you always listen to the music through Spotify, iTunes or Rdio?      
      Or do you use Pandora, Deezer or even Vkontakte to listen to your       
      music? Tired of switching to the player? Install Simplify and know      
      what's playing, switch and seek tracks, control sound volume with       
      our easy to use application. Simplify is the best music                 
      controller, and it allows you to concentrate on your work,              
      internet browsing, documents editing without interruptions.             
                                                                              
      Stop yourself from constantly switching to player window or             
      Safari/Chrome tab to find out the current track album art, it will      
      always be on your desktop.                                              
                                                                              
      Your desktop is always filled with windows and documents? Don't         
      worry, you can assign keyboard shortcuts for almost every action:       
      playback toggle, track changes, sound volume levels.                    
                                                                              
      Simplify is music controller. You needA to open your favourite          
      player and start playing music in order to use Simplify. Simplify       
      doesn't play music, it controls it.                                     
                                                                              
      Key features of the application:                                        
      - Album cover and track title always on your desktop;                   
      - Desktop widget jackets: create your own look & feel for               
        desktop widget using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Follow the             
        documentation on our site to create jacket;                           
      - Download our free browser extension for Safari/Chrome to              
        control web players like Pandora, Deezer and Vkontakte. Create        
        support for your own web players and we will include it into our      
        browser extensions;                                                   
      - Cute mini-player window (can be shown with a customizable             
        keyboard shortcut) to control sound volume, switch tracks, seek       
        tracks, toggle playback;                                              
      - Customizable global shortcuts to control sound volume, switch         
        tracks, rewind tracks, toggle playback, and toggle mini-player;       
      - Control Spotify, Rdio and iTunes on any Mac in your local             
        network: switch & seek tracks, control volume and see what's          
        playing on your Mac remotely:                                         
      - Simplify may be automatically launched when Spotify, iTunes or        
        Rdio starts;                                                          
      - Current song title in menu bar;                                       
      - Easily copy track title and link to track to share with               
        friends.                                                              
      - Scrobble to Last.fm from iTunes, Rdio or Spotify or any web           
        player that doesn't support scribbling.                               
                                                                              
                    
                                                                          
                        ..: iNSTALL/REGiSTER NOTES :..                      
                                                                             
                                                                             
      Unpack and enjoy.
